betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Your mentor gets that bemused, knowing look on his face as you realize that you haven't been epsecially dilligent about keeping an eye out for nodes. As a result your grand design for setting up automated wand recharging has hit a bit of an obstacle.

But not to worry, your mentor is in a generous mood. If you can craft six balance shards in a crucible using only five items to supply the necessary Essentia, without any excess or spillage, he'll trade those shards for the location of a weak node he knows no one ever bothered with. They're pale, sure, but they'll get the job done.

Part of you feels like you'd rather work towards making the crucible obsolete given what you mentor has said about its potential dangers, but surely you can solve a simple puzzle like this, right?

Â§3Making the questbook check for whether you've solved the mentor's puzzle would, itself, be a much greater challenge. So instead you can invent you own story if you decide not to.

You can only choose one of your mentor's six nodes, BTW, so choose carefully.
